mapper.insert:
select service_sequence.nextval from dual
insert into ${jdbc.schema}.PERMISSIONS
ID,
PERMISSION,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_BY,

mapper.update:
update ${jdbc.schema}.PERMISSIONS
PERMISSION = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ${jdbc.schema}.PERMISSIONS set PERMISSION = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
